case.state: Better get out of the way.
Looks like One such as I gets a bitchin' new ride. I'll steal it and call it the R.E.O. Succwagon.
Hello.
I'm not Astolfo.
Bug vs Bean. Let's go.
Give me your dicc.
Give me card.
I have the good hand.
I'm such a good bean! Praise me!
Praise the Bean for he is doing well!
Meh. I, the Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie, have had both better and worse playing card hands.
Want a Sprite Cranberry?
Let the voice of love take you higher!
This hand is bad. It burns myself.
Bad cards make me just want cheese sammich.
Give better cards!
You have stepped to the Bean in the arena of cuteness. Bean cannot allow challengers to his throne. Forgive Bean.
The Bean has done that, but to men and with the succing of the dicc.
I do not date. I simply succ the dicc and call them gay.
The Fate/ Apocrypha light novels are good. Read them.
I got mine, thanks.
I'm not complicated Bean. I want to succ dicc and call people gay. If they say "No U," I'll say "Takes one to know one."
Looks like a Jill Sandwich would have been more appropriate.
A gentlebean's wager? Interesting. Let us hope you don't live to regret it.
What secrets Bean holds may destroy the human mind. Or maybe Bean only hears the Mii Channel theme from the Nintendo Wii?
Bean lies to everyone. Frequently.
Bean hates them! They ruin the fabric of Bean's body! They stain them and make them smell of tobacco!
Family matters not to a mass-produced plushie such as Bean.
Bean needs not money. Would burn every dollar. Destroy it. Yes. Fire.
Bean judges not.
Size matters not. You will still feel the succ. Then the sting of "u gay."
Don't lie to Bean.
You anger the Bean! You are the worst example of horsemanity!
You better be. Bean will hold you to that when Bean succs your dicc before calling you gay.
Bean can see in the dark.
Bean only goes for dicc.
Bean does not.
Bean has no partners. Bean merely goes from one dicc to another and leaves once they are called gay.
Porn offers nothing for Bean.
Bean can succ many diccs in a day.
Bean succs the dicc.
Bean never sleeps. Always awake. Always watching.
My favorite color is D I C C.
I'm simple Bean. I think not about things that cause me confusion.
Aside from dicc, there's not much. The moon is better.
Fate/Apocrypha Opening Theme – Eiyuu Unmei no Uta
D I C C
When I accidentally bought white chocolate instead of milk. Bean was ashamed.
Here. Kill a man on camera. People will watch if you make an example of one former subscriber.
Bean only wants to succ dicc and call gay.
Fate/Apocrypha Opening Theme – Eiyuu Unmei no Uta
Kill them. Or just fade away.
Bean has taken life.
The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie that Sucks Your Dick and Calls You Gay noticed as well.
For his neutral special, the Bean Plushie uses G U N.
Dicc, of course.
Bean is no demon.
The Bean has done many things.
1/10. No dicc.
Happy HalloBean.
Merry Christmas. Want a Sprite Cranberry?
Bean is actually on the online roster! Not just offline or unofficial hostings!
Happy New Year!
You don't get succ. You get erased.
Take Bean's picture. He is beautiful and lovely.
No apocalypse can deter the Bean.
Anyone interested in a contract?
Will you turn evil if I cut off your ahoge?
The Bean is dancing.
One second. Sammich time.
I have no clothing, for I am Bean.
I have nothing to strip again! I'm just bean!
I lose, yet have nothing to lose.
DISAPPOINTING!!!
What is a Bean?
I know! The Bean Puts on a hat...
A miserable little pile of succ!
And takes it off!
Got anything by EGOIST?
~Name~ must strip. The Bean Plushie is pleased.
Aw shiiiiiet...
Real shit?
Your clothes. Give them to me.
You are another who has fallen before the Bean.
I am bean. I sweat not.
None. Bean has no father. Bean was made in a factory.
All that matters that they have a dicc for me to succ. Then I call them gay.
It's no secret, but a Bean such as I succs the dicc and calls you gay.
The bigger the dicc, the bigger the Bean.
I'd rather succ the dicc, but must play cards to do so.

Look, Nicole. I'm here to succ the dicc, not become the Great Bean Orator. I already have a larger than average linecount for an April Fool's character. I believe your request and opinion are both based on an unrealistic standard that is quite harmful for characters like a Bean such as I. Please attempt to be more considerate in the future.
I am just Bean. I arrive. I succ dicc. I call them gay. I fade away. Repeat.
The Bean walks a lonely road, Nicole.
Neither. Bean only wants dicc to succ and then call gay.
You have not the dicc. One must find a way to succ you and call you gay.
Cheers to you, ~name~.
Why are you choosing to play me with women, ~player~? They have no dicc to succ. Unless...
I bet you're regretting playing with a plush keychain instead of someone attractive, aren't you, ~name~?
Whee! ~Name~ loses!
I still see dicc. You know what they say? Bean see dicc, Bean succ dicc.
Bean smash!
This gonna be some good shit.
Press this button. It does nothing.
I lick this quite a bit.
Do better or face my Noble Phantasm.
Soon.
Try to delay it as much as you want, your dicc will still be succed by a keychain haunted by its own sentience.
Strip more. Present one such as myself the dicc.
I need a drink since I'm so thirsty today.
Hooray for you!
Almost as much as I like to succ the dicc and call you gay.
Meh. Good enough.
Reminds the Bean of Abigail Williams. Although if you're thinking of her in a game like this, reexamine yourself and your life.
Surrender your ego. Be free! Be free!
You lose, ~name~. Which means you're a loser and I, the Haunted Astolfo Bean, am a winner.
Don't worry about the Bean. He's just over here, vibing.
Bean there, done that.
Nice.
Belt was bet now it's gone.
Entertain me! I am demand it!
You want some cheese with your whine, ~name~?
Dance time.
That didn't make much sense, but i had to make the pun.
But Bean still curses those without dicc to get a dicc.
This is pleases myself! But you can do best yet!
Give me your ~clothing~.

Ah, ah, ah, ah
Succ your dicc, succ your dicc.
A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor," otherwise known as "total bullshit."
Faster. The game will soon be drawing to a close.
Your dicc is still exposed. You're simply chumming the water right now, friend.
Whee! I like this much, but dicc would be better.
Simply delicious! You have made the Bean's day!
That was "Staying a Bean" by the BeeJays. Thank you.
Seriously, whip out the dicc.
It will be ending soon, won't it?
If you think I'm overly horny, grating, and offer little more than sex jokes...
Yo, you a'ight.
You can get as made as you want, but you still lost to a plush keychain.
I'm a simple, haunted, made in China, plush keychain made in the Likeness of Astolfo from Fate/Apocrypha...
You have failed this round.
Here. i hope this Sprite Cranberry helps.
Remember that I'm a meme. Chloe Von Einzbern is an actual character.
Hey, that's cool and all.
And you'll just have to live with that...
All I want to see is some dicc. Is that too much to ask?
Use this failure as a step to future victory.
Yes. Be this good for me? Time will be the teller.
This is the type of content The Bean Plushie enjoys seeing.
You are not immune to Bean.
Even if I've lost the game, your dicc will be mine.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ as nice as my hat.
Aw, yeah. This pleases the Bean Plushie.
Think fast, ~name~.
Not immune at all.
This just delays the inevitable.
But we still end up without them. Such is Life.
This, ironically, gives you a leg up on the competition.
You feeling lucky?
Will you ever live down losing so spectacularly to a plushie?
I'm so. Fucking. Precious. When I.
Bean would hate to be you at this moment.
Bean feels as if our time together is slowly coming to a close, ~player~, ~NAME~.
Bitch, I a, a model.
Astolfo has slept with over 1000 women before even becoming a Heroic Spirit. A princess doesn't impress a lush bean likeness of him.
Nah, just kidding you.
I'm just a bean. Nothing more, nothing less.
Smile.
But Bean would always hate to not be Bean.
Bean supposes all things must end...
Gimme those nipples, my friend.
~clothing~ off. Now.
Not even your nipples will save you.
I am the Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie That Succs Your Dicc and Calls You Gay.
Bean desires your dicc.
Blame me, rich boy.
I enjoy much of this! For sure.
Give me the dicc! I must succ!
Nipples are still good though.
Those two things will happen. In that order. To you.
Not dicc, but we'll get there.
Dicc! Time for dicc, yes? Yes!
Real shit?
Bare thine dicc.
It's about to be a succ party in here.

Brave shine...
Stay the night...
Save my live
Your brave shine...
Brave shine...
Barely a dicc. A dicclet if you will.
Do better! You have disappointed the Bean!
Get bigger dicc.
Way to ruin the party with that thing. I'm still gonna succ, but, damn. You let everybody down. Hard.
Farewell, Judas! Turn to ash, Dust to Dust; back to your weakness of old!
Hells yesssssssssssss.
Dicc is dicc, I guess.
Pretty standard, really. Nothing special.
A standard issue dicc. Regulation size, not too much resistance.
This glass heart, covered in scratches, lights a fever I’d nearly forgotten.
This is no challenge for the Bean.
The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie likes.
Big dicc. Succed bigger.
Bean will steal your big dicc energy.
A dicc that big will soon be succed by a plush keychain.
Dread it. Run from it. The succ will come.
I will succ your dicc. You have no choice. This is your fate.
Target acquired.
Seize the means of reproduction!
Bean will keep on the party hat as he succs your dicc, ~name~.
LAST STARDUST, climb the skies! Dust to Dust, Ash to Ash, into the distance!
Someone tell Marie Antoinette that I found her twin.
Bean can do that with a me.
You'll never find, as long as you live. Someone who loves you tender like I do...
Bean is victorious! ~Name~ is a failure!
Hat's off to you, ~name~.
Looks like Bean wins the booby prize...
The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie cares little for boob.

I'm just S
Just standing here.
Looks like someone's in need of calamine lotion.
Not much different than a man's.
What a sad prize it is too. As flat as this useless button.
Bean said Bean cares little for boob, not that Bean cares for little boob.
Bean could fade into the void using his ill-defined powers if he wished to.
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
Cheers, ~name~. You're a rather decent sport.
Not very special, I do say.
It could be worse. You could be flat.

Medium boob is OK
If you don't succ the dicc and call people gay.
Those a'ight. Not a dicc, but not bad.
Those are bigger than a Bean such as myself.
She's got 'uge tracts of land!!!
I'm sure many people want those. Bean, however, wants another grilled cheese.
They are not bigger than Bean for long.
Santa? ♩ ♪ ♫ ♬It's the thirst! Thirstiest time! Of the year!♩ ♪ ♫ ♬
I know there will be no dicc, so I just hope you have fun.
I will bounce on your grave!
This button's as useful as your crotch is to me.
If you give ~name~ a dicc, Merlin, Bean will spare you one time.
No dicc?
Go outside, NEET.
If you liked that, you'll love this.
Not my thing, but you do it well.
Another one bites the dust.
Not dicc, don't care.
Have it your way, Mage of Flowers. When next Bean meets you, Bean will end you.
You lucked out, my friend.
Space is nothing but aether.
So, no dicc?
I'll do you one better. Want a Sprite Cranberry?
I'm the only one allowed to occupy that niche. Nothing personnel.
Need help?
This will help. Did I replicate? Or is this just another, mass-produced Bean Plushie.
Licc, licc, licc. Then I succ the dicc.
Bean hungers!
I am... inevitable.
So you were being truthful to the Bean?
Let me succ, succ, succ!
Once this game is over, nothing will protect you from me.
I will succ your dicc and call you gay. Make peace with it. It is your destiny.
That's better. The Bean Plushie will still succ you later though.
Succ.
It's the end for you.
Party time!
Your future's so succ, I gotta wear shades.
This drink is but the first thing I will succ down this night.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
Succ.
This is bringing me much of the joy.
That's it? Pretty pathetic, not gonna lie.
Now give me your dicc.
Need to rehydrate? Have a Sprite Cranberry.
Cheers, ~name~. I will soon begin to succ your dicc.
Looks like someone's making a special 10 roll.
Looks like you could use a Sprite Cranberry.
This is not what I, The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie That Sucks Your Dick and Calls You Gay signed up for.
Now declare the Bean as your superior!
Merlin, if you're listening, give ~name~ a dicc.
You have done your best, that's all anyone can ask of you.
At least I'm not playing with Kiara.
I wonder if that's how she uses Saint Quartz too?
Get succed, succubus.
Fool. Never trust a bean. Or a Bean, for that matter.
Let Bean try!
You're valid.
You have fallen like so many before you.
Merlin has forsaken Bean! No forgiveness!
You are the only one who can control your destiny!
No need to see "Heaven's Hole" again.
I'd kill for a grilled cheese right now.
The Bean claims victory over you!
No succ.
Cheating is good. Be gay. Do crimes.
A new mount for the Bean to ride into battle!
I'm happy bean.
Deal with it.
Looks like you need to rehydrate.
The Bean cares not for winning or losing...
The Bean cares not for winning or losing...
Only succing dicc and calling gay.
My destiny? That's simple. I will succ someone's dicc and call them gay.
I am Bean.
Should Bean use his Noble Phantasm?
No. Now is not the time for that.
The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie That Succs Your Dicc and Calls You gay is dancing

I am the Bean of my sword
Fabric is my body, Stuffing is my blood
I have succed over 1000 diccs
Unknown to death, nor known to life
Have withstood pain to succ many diccs
Yet these mitts will never hold anything
So, as I pray...
{b}UNLIMITED BEAN WORKS!{!reset}
I have hunted you down here, ~Player~. Now give me your dicc. I must succ.
Nothing can stop the Bean now!
Everything into the Bean.
The Bean has lost, but Bean will stay with ~player~ forever.

epilogue.title: The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie that Sucks Your Dick and Calls You Gay

scene.directive: I'm sorry, You must have mistaken me for The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie that Sucks Your Dick and Gives a Shit.
